alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 5:24PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 630 PM MST... At 523 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Estrella Mountain Ranch, or 7 miles south of Goodyear, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Tolleson, Cashion, Phoenix International Raceway, Perryville, Liberty, Estrella Mountain Park, Estrella Mountain Ranch and Rainbow Valley. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 119 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument
